arts.sum: Roma come into the game having won their opening two games without conceding a goal. However Torino find themselves in the relegation spots in this early stage having failed to score in their first t...

arts.ttl: Roma vs. Torino sunday at 12:30 CEST
arts.sum: The Giallorossi are chasing a third consecutive win after narrow victories over Bologna and Pisa, while Torino are looking for their first three points of the season. For the second consecutive season, Serie A’s first lunchtime kick-off features Roma: last year it was on matchday four at Marassi against Genoa, a 1–1 draw.

arts.ttl: Roma vs Torino - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Roma and Torino, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
